text: Fernando Barrachina Plo (24 February 1947 – 4 January 2016) was a Spanish professional footballer who played as a central defender. ==Career== Born in Granada, Barrachina played for Granada, Valencia and Cádiz. He made one international appearance for Spain in 1969. ==Later life and death== He died on 4 January 2016, at the age of 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Footballers from Granada
title: Fernando Barrachina
